4 #include "LibCryptoSecException.h"

6 class SmartcardModuleException : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN = 1,
12  ENUMERATING_CERTIFICATES = 2,
13  ENUMERATING_PRIVATE_KEYS = 3,
14  DECRYPTING_DATA = 4,
15  SMARTCARD_NOT_AVAILABLE = 5,
16  SMARTCARD_READER_NOT_AVAILABLE = 6,
17  INVALID_PIN = 0x000000A0,
18  INVALID_PKCS11_MODULE = 8,
19  BLOCKED_PIN = 0x000000A4,
20  ID_NOT_FOUND = 9,
21  };
22  SmartcardModuleException(std::string where)
23  {
24  this->where = where;
25  this->errorCode = SmartcardModuleException::UNKNOWN;
26  this->details = "";
27  }
28  SmartcardModuleException(SmartcardModuleException::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where)
29  {
30  this->where = where;
31  this->errorCode = errorCode;
32  this->details = "";
33  }
34  SmartcardModuleException(SmartcardModuleException::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where, bool opensslDetails)
35  {
36  this->where = where;
37  this->errorCode = errorCode;
38  if (opensslDetails)
39  {
40  this->details = OpenSSLErrorHandler::getErrors();
41  }
42  else
43  {
44  this->details = "";
45  }
46  }
47  virtual ~SmartcardModuleException() throw () {}
48  virtual std::string getMessage() const
49  {
50  return (SmartcardModuleException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode));
51  }
52  virtual std::string toString() const
53  {
54  std::string ret;
55  if (this->errorCode == SmartcardModuleException::UNKNOWN)
56  {
57  ret = "SmartcardModuleException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  ret = "SmartcardModuleException: " + SmartcardModuleException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
62  }
63  if (this->details != "")
64  {
65  ret += " More details:\n" + this->details + ".";
66  }
67  return ret;
68  }
69  virtual SmartcardModuleException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
70  {
71  return this->errorCode;
72  }
73  static std::string errorCode2Message(SmartcardModuleException::ErrorCode errorCode)
74  {
75  std::string ret;
76  switch (errorCode)
77  {
78  case SmartcardModuleException::UNKNOWN:
79  ret = "Unknown error";
80  break;
81  case SmartcardModuleException::ENUMERATING_CERTIFICATES:
82  ret = "Enumerating certificates";
83  break;
84  case SmartcardModuleException::ENUMERATING_PRIVATE_KEYS:
85  ret = "Enumerating private keys";
86  break;
87  case SmartcardModuleException::DECRYPTING_DATA:
88  ret = "Decrypting data";
89  break;
90  case SmartcardModuleException::SMARTCARD_NOT_AVAILABLE:
91  ret = "Smartcard not available";
92  break;
93  case SmartcardModuleException::SMARTCARD_READER_NOT_AVAILABLE:
94  ret = "Smartcard reader not available";
95  break;
96  case SmartcardModuleException::INVALID_PIN:
97  ret = "Invalid PIN";
98  break;
99  case SmartcardModuleException::INVALID_PKCS11_MODULE:
100  ret = "Invalid PKCS11 module";
101  break;
102  case SmartcardModuleException::BLOCKED_PIN:
103  ret = "Blocked PIN";
104  break;
105  case SmartcardModuleException::ID_NOT_FOUND:
106  ret = "ID not found";
107  break;
108 // case SmartcardModuleException:::
109 // ret = "";
110 // break;
111  }
112  return ret;
113  }
114 protected:
115  SmartcardModuleException::ErrorCode errorCode;
116 };
